TestCase.Title: Test case EID_CLIENT_D_24
TestCase.Purpose: This test unit evaluates the ability of the eID-Client to display the content of the element „TransactionInfo“ of EAC1InputType message.

Command.Text: Follow the Online-Authentication as described in until the data from the EAC1InputType message is presented to the user. In deviation to EID_CLIENT_B_01 also use the element „TransactionInfo“ in EAC1InputType.

TestStep.Description: The element "TransactionInfo" has the value "eID-Client test".

ExpectedResult.Text: The eID-Client displays the content of the element "TransactionInfo".
